DOC.brief_summary: Studies find relationship dietary fiber consumption body weight regulation . This relationship may stem enhanced satiety fermentation certain fiber large intestine . The objective study determine compare satiety rating , change food intake , gastrointestinal effect four fiber : fructooligosaccharide , inulin , soluble corn fiber , resistant starch .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman Age 1840 year Nonsmoking Not take weight loss medication Nondieting ( weight change 11 pound three month ) BMI 18.5 29 Spoken write English literacy Do regularly consume breakfast Food allergy wheat , soy , peanut , dairy BMI le 25 great 29 upon admission study Cancer diagnosis past 5 year History heart disease , kidney disease , diabetes , eat disorder History ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease , gastrointestinal condition History drug alcohol abuse past 6 month Use lipidlowering , antihypertensive , antiinflammatory steroid medication Concurrent recent ( within 30 day ) intervention study participation Pregnant lactate Irregular menstrual cycle Vegetarians People eat approximately 15 gram fiber per day
